# Filled Area Plots in R

```{r, message=FALSE}


library(plotly)
p <- plot_ly(x = c(1, 2, 3, 4), y = c(0, 2, 3, 5), fill = "tozeroy", filename="r-docs/area-plot")
add_trace(p, x = c(1, 2, 3, 4), y = c(3, 5, 1, 7), fill = "tonexty")



```
